languages.text: "Простите, Лорд-капитан. С моей стороны было неслыханной наглостью заявляться к вам со столь пустяковой просьбой. Пожалуйста, давайте забудем об этом... недоразумении". {n}Учтиво исполнив прощальный жест тонкой ладонью, Кассия покидает ваш кабинет.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Простите, Лорд-капитан. С моей стороны было неслыханной наглостью заявляться к вам со столь пустяковой просьбой. Пожалуйста, давайте забудем об этом... недоразумении". {n}Учтиво исполнив прощальный жест тонкой ладонью, Кассия покидает ваш кабинет.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain. It was outrageous of me to approach you with such a trifling request. Please, let us forget about this... misunderstanding." {n}With a courteous farewell gesture of her thin hand, Cassia exits your study.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain. It was outrageous of me to approach you with such a trifling request. Please, let us forget about this... misunderstanding." {n}With a courteous farewell gesture of her thin hand, Cassia exits your study.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain. It was outrageous of me to approach you with such a trifling request. Please, let us forget about this... misunderstanding." {n}With a courteous farewell gesture of her thin hand, Cassia exits your study.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “请你原谅，舰长大人。我竟然用如此微不足道的小事来打扰你，实在是罪不可赦。请忘记这个小小的……误会吧。”{n}卡西娅伸出纤细的手掌，礼貌地向你道别，之后离开了你的书房。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain. It was outrageous of me to approach you with such a trifling request. Please, let us forget about this... misunderstanding." {n}With a courteous farewell gesture of her thin hand, Cassia exits your study.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “请你原谅，舰长大人。我竟然用如此微不足道的小事来打扰你，实在是罪不可赦。请忘记这个小小的……误会吧。”{n}卡西娅伸出纤细的手掌，礼貌地向你道别，之后离开了你的书房。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Verzeiht, Lord Captain. Es war unerhört von mir, Euch wegen einer solch trivialen Bitte zu stören. Lasst uns dieses ... Missverständnis bitte vergessen." {n}Mit einer höflichen Abschiedsgeste ihrer dünnen Hand verlässt Cassia dein Arbeitszimmer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain. It was outrageous of me to approach you with such a trifling request. Please, let us forget about this... misunderstanding." {n}With a courteous farewell gesture of her thin hand, Cassia exits your study.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht, Lord Captain. Es war unerhört von mir, Euch wegen einer solch trivialen Bitte zu stören. Lasst uns dieses ... Missverständnis bitte vergessen." {n}Mit einer höflichen Abschiedsgeste ihrer dünnen Hand verlässt Cassia dein Arbeitszimmer.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Je vous prie de me pardonner, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. C'était extravagant de ma part de venir vous trouver pour une demande aussi futile. Essayons d'oublier ce... malentendu. » {n}Avec un geste d'au revoir poli de sa fine main, Cassia quitte votre bureau.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain. It was outrageous of me to approach you with such a trifling request. Please, let us forget about this... misunderstanding." {n}With a courteous farewell gesture of her thin hand, Cassia exits your study.{/n}

traits.locale_text: Je vous prie de me pardonner, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. C'était extravagant de ma part de venir vous trouver pour une demande aussi futile. Essayons d'oublier ce... malentendu. » {n}Avec un geste d'au revoir poli de sa fine main, Cassia quitte votre bureau.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Le ruego que me perdone, Lord Capitán. Ha sido intolerable acercarme a usted por algo tan insignificante. Olvidemos este... malentendido». {n}Cassia sale de tu estudio con un cortés gesto de despedida con la mano.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain. It was outrageous of me to approach you with such a trifling request. Please, let us forget about this... misunderstanding." {n}With a courteous farewell gesture of her thin hand, Cassia exits your study.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Le ruego que me perdone, Lord Capitán. Ha sido intolerable acercarme a usted por algo tan insignificante. Olvidemos este... malentendido». {n}Cassia sale de tu estudio con un cortés gesto de despedida con la mano.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「お許しください、ロード・キャプテン。このような些細な依頼であなたに近づいたのは、とても乱暴なことでした。どうかこの誤解について…お忘れください」{n}細い手で礼儀正しい別れのジェスチャーをすると、カシアはあなたの書斎を出る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain. It was outrageous of me to approach you with such a trifling request. Please, let us forget about this... misunderstanding." {n}With a courteous farewell gesture of her thin hand, Cassia exits your study.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「お許しください、ロード・キャプテン。このような些細な依頼であなたに近づいたのは、とても乱暴なことでした。どうかこの誤解について…お忘れください」{n}細い手で礼儀正しい別れのジェスチャーをすると、カシアはあなたの書斎を出る。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Bağışla beni Lord Kaptan. Böyle abes bir konuyla seni rahatsız edişim, kabul edilecek şey değil. Lütfen. Unutalım bu... Yanlış anlaşılmayı." {n}Narin eliyle yaptığı zarif bir veda hareketinin ardından çalışma odanı terk ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain. It was outrageous of me to approach you with such a trifling request. Please, let us forget about this... misunderstanding." {n}With a courteous farewell gesture of her thin hand, Cassia exits your study.{/n}
